name: Asteroids: The Invasion
description:
Yo!

So this is a follow-up to my game Asteroids! So the reasoning behind is that I realised that Asteroids was um.. a bad game. The code was basic, lots of bugs,etc. You couldnt even shoot the asteroids.

Well, I just made it better. I added :

- Shooting Asteroids

- Camera Shake

-Explosion FX

- MUSIC

- ACTUAL Asteroids instead of just dots.

-HP bars

- Waaaay More Immersive

So Hope You Guys Like It

Asteroid sprite from AX Assets.
